decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Magda, Brazen Outlaw's ability to create Treasure tokens to ramp into powerful aggressive creatures and spells quickly. The deck includes a mix of efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning, alongside artifact creatures and vehicles to apply pressure on the opponent. Cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon disrupt opponents' mana bases, while cards like Bonecrusher Giant and Bogardan Hellkite provide big threats that can quickly end the game. The deck aims to apply early pressure, disrupt opponents' game plans, and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. With a focus on fast, aggressive plays and resource generation, this deck looks to overwhelm opponents with sheer speed and power.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, aiming to apply constant pressure and control the board. The commander, Grist, Voracious Larva, serves as a powerful engine for the deck, generating value from sacrificing creatures and creating insect tokens. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures with graveyard synergies, such as Tarmogoyf and Gravecrawler, alongside powerful disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. Additionally, the deck includes various ways to recur creatures from the graveyard, such as Animate Dead and Unearth, to maintain a steady stream of threats. Overall, the strategy revolves around a proactive game plan that combines aggression with disruption to outpace and outmaneuver opponents.

The deck focuses on a strong aggressive strategy with Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd as the commander. It includes a mix of powerful creatures, disruptive spells, and equipment to quickly pressure the opponent and control the board. The deck aims to establish early board presence with creatures like Blade Splicer, Elite Spellbinder, and Mother of Runes while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Drannith Magistrate and Palace Jailer. It includes removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and effects like Parallax Wave to deal with threats. The deck also utilizes cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Skullclamp to generate card advantage and maintain pressure on the opponent.
